name: cads
description: #### How to setup development environment * [Install activator](https://www.typesafe.com/activator/download) * [Install node & npm](https://nodejs.org/en/download/) * [Install gulp](https://github.com/gulpjs/gulp/blob/master/docs/getting-started.md) * [Install bower](http://bower.io/#install-bower) * git clone https://github.com/coska-davisville/project-cads.git * cd project-cads * bower install * activator run * [Open in browser](http://localhost:9000)
author: Coska
